channel.title: Political Instability on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Political Instability on FinanClub

item.title: BTG
item.description: score:145 Chances: Mali’s industrial gold output is expected to drop by about 14% this year to 53.7 metric tons, which may lead to higher gold prices and increased demand for mining companies like B2Gold Corp. Investing in gold and other precious metals stocks is always a solid addition to any investment portfolio, especially during uncertain times in the stock market, which could lead to increased interest in B2Gold Corp.
